title: Tech giant rebrands with new minimalist logo
description: Acme Corp unveiled a minimalist logo as part of its rebranding strategy to appeal to younger demographics.

title: Lebanese coffee chain expands brand identity regionally
description: Cedar Coffee updated its branding and interior design to align with its expansion across the Middle East.

title: International airline's visual identity refresh emphasises sustainability
description: SkyWings introduced eco‭friendly colors and imagery in its new branding to highlight its commitment to sustainability.

title: Start-up's playful branding helps it stand out in crowded fintech industry
description: Fintech start”up MoneyMate uses bright colors and friendly illustrations to differentiate itself from established financial institutions.

title: Rebranding of national TV network modernizes its image
description: National TV network LBC modernized its visual identity with dynamic graphics and a new color palette.
